text: Carmageddon is a vehicular combat video game released for personal computers in 1997. It was produced by Stainless Games and published by Interplay Productions and Sales Curve Interactive. It was later ported to other platforms, and spawned a series. ==References== Category:1997 video games Category:Android (operating system) games Category:Classic Mac OS games Category:DOS games Category:IOS games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Racing video games Category:Vehicular combat games Category:Video games about death games Category:Windows games
title: Carmageddon
